about_the_game:
Following the very popular Japanese Anime Voice series, this pack will expand your project with more exciting and fun Japanese male anime-voices speaking very usable Japanese phrases!

Bring your anime characters to life with these common, everyday vocal phrases for Victory, Following, Unable to Fight, Damage, Strong Attacks, Aha!, Anger, Surprise, and many, many more!

FEATURES:

* 126 Japanese animation-like male voices (phrases)
* OGG, M4A formats included
* Male voices (in Japanese phrases) for Visual Novel Games, RPG and much more!
* English translation list included
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engines of your choice!

Tracklist:

1. 001_Start1.wav いくよ! Let's go!
2. 002_Start2.wav 準備はいいかい? You ready?
3. 003_Victory1.wav ふぅ...なんとかなったね Phew... we made it
4. 004_Victory2.wav よし、先へ進もう Alright, let's keep going
5. 005_Follow1.wav うん、いいよ Sure, no problem
6. 006_Follow2.wav わかった! Got it!
7. 007_Choice1.wav どうする? Now what?
8. 008_Choice2.wav 何をすればいいかな? What should I do?
9. 009_Runaway1.wav 撤退しよう Let's retreat
10. 010_Runaway2.wav よし、逃げよう Okay, time to run
11. 011_Tool use1.wav これを使うよ I'll use this
12. 012_Tool use2.wav はい、これ! This one!
13. 013_Healthy turn1.wav どうしようかな? Hmm, what should I do?
14. 014_Healthy turn2.wav さてさて... Now then...
15. 015_Dying turn1.wav いてて... Ouch...
16. 016_Dying turn2.wav ちょっとまずいかも... This looks bad...
17. 017_Abnormal state turn1.wav うぅ... Ugh...
18. 018_Abnormal state turn2.wav 厳しいなぁ... Definitely not good...
19. 019_Unable to fight1.wav ぐぁっ...ダメだったか... Guah...no good...huh
20. 020_Unable to fight2.wav あとは...よろしく... The rest... is up to you...
21. 021_Damage1.wav ぐっ Guh
22. 022_Damage2.wav いてっ Ow
23. 023_Damage3.wav うっ Uh
24. 024_Damage4.wav いたっ... Ouch...
25. 025_Damage5.wav うわっ Uwa
26. 026_Large damage1.wav いっつ...! Tch...!
27. 027_Large damage2.wav ぐうっ! Guh-...!

29. 029_Large damage4.wav うぐうう! Ghh!

31. 031_No damage1.wav 効かないよ That doesn't work
32. 032_No damage2.wav その程度か Is that all you've got?
33. 033_Weak attack1.wav せいっ Here I...go!
34. 034_Weak attack2.wav ほっ Ho
35. 035_Weak attack3.wav はっ Ha
36. 036_Weak attack4.wav それっ There!
37. 037_Weak attack5.wav とうっ Toh
38. 038_Medium attack1.wav えいっ! Eiyah!
39. 039_Medium attack2.wav はぁっ! Haa!
40. 040_Medium attack3.wav おりゃ! Ryah!
41. 041_Medium attack4.wav せいやっ! Sha!
42. 042_Medium attack5.wav えいやっ! Yaa!
43. 043_Strong attack1.wav はあああ! Haaaa!
44. 044_Strong attack2.wav そーれっ! Taaaake this!
45. 045_Strong attack3.wav せいやあああ! Shhyaaaa!
46. 046_Strong attack4.wav これでどうだ! How about this!

48. 048_Recover1.wav 大丈夫かい? You OK?
49. 049_Recover2.wav いま助けるからね! Hold on, I've got you!
50. 050_Recover3.wav 援護するよ! I've got your back!

detailed_description:
Following the very popular Japanese Anime Voice series, this pack will expand your project with more exciting and fun Japanese male anime-voices speaking very usable Japanese phrases!

Bring your anime characters to life with these common, everyday vocal phrases for Victory, Following, Unable to Fight, Damage, Strong Attacks, Aha!, Anger, Surprise, and many, many more!

* OGG, M4A formats included
* Male voices (in Japanese phrases) for Visual Novel Games, RPG and much more!
* English translation list included
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engines of your choice!
